subject: Re: New Web Site
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Thanx for the great write up about my site, i have been working on 
it all the time. I am looking forward to the DVD...can't wait.

-Steve


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, William Murphy <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>
> Steve, great site and compelling evp's. It's wonderful to find 
other dedicated researchers who actively pursue recording messages 
from the non-physicals. BTW, your DVD shipped this weekend so you'll 
have it shortly, USPO tracking # 0307 0020 004 2862 5698.
>    
>   Thanks, Bill
> 
> Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:
>           I have a new web site i'd like people to check out. It 
is dedicated 
> to the work of Frank and of all the possibilities the box may 
hold. 
> The link is www.keyportparanormal.com
> 
> Thanx,
> -Steve
>
